author: Amanda Macias
title: Aircraft carrier captain pleads for help after more than 100 crew are infected with coronavirus
description: "We are not at war. Sailors do not need to die. If we do not act now, we are failing to properly take care of our most trusted asset — our Sailors," wrote Capt. Brett Crozier of the USS Theodore Roosevelt.
content:
WASHINGTON  The captain of a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier with more than 100 cases of coronavirus wrote a stunning plea for help to senior military officials. 
In a four-page letter, first reported by The San Francisco Chronicle, Capt. Brett Crozier of the USS… [+1811 chars]
